title: Phu Quoc Beachfront Retreat with Glistening Outdoor Pool & Tranquil Spa
description: Relish days of sun-kissed splendour, stroll along palm-lined beaches and indulge in unparalleled tropical luxury at this family-friendly haven, nestled in the heart of Phu Quoc. Perfectly positioned along the sandy shores of Bai Dai Beach, the Indochine-styled resort unveils a world of Vietnamese luxury with its well-appointed rooms, your choice of five restaurants and the Sim bar, a luxurious spa and an expansive outdoor pool. Tee off from the nearby 18-hole golf course or embark on a thrilling safari and make the most of your Pearl Island retreat.
offer_address: Bãi Dài, Gành Dầu, Phú Quốc, Kiên Giang, Vietnam
